answers.answer: Just follow the diet that they gave you and you will be fine.  When you have gestational diabetes theres a chance that you could have a large baby not a smaller one. Have you been through the class yet and spoken with the dietician?
Yeah but I'm having issues making myself eat period. I have no appetite.

question: Diagnosed with gestational diabetes, I'm worried my baby isn't growing. How do I know she is getting what she needs? I've lost 15 lbs my entire pregnancy.
title: ready but nervous
